title: Valerie Jarrett
deleted: Jarrett has been the target of racist attacks for her heritage. [[Roseanne Barr]] compared Jarrett to an ape using [[Twitter]]. Barr has a history of racist comments toward black women. In response to her attack on Jarrett, Barr was released by her talent agency ICM, and her show ''Roseanne'' was cancelled.<ref>{{cite web |title=Roseanne Barr Had a History of Racist Tweets, Conspiracy Theories and Controversy Before Roseanne Was Canceled |url=https://time.com/5294402/roseanne-cancelled-abc-racist-conspiracy-theory/ |first=Mahita |last=Gajanan |publisher=[[Time Magazine]] |date=May 29, 2018 |access-date=December 18, 2020}}</ref>
